Name: Square Farm
About the game: You have just become the proud new owner of a fertile square field. Can you master the skill of square farming and earn yourself a bountiful, quadrangular harvest? What is square farming you ask? It's simple! Plant your weirdly shaped blocks of seeds somewhere in your big, square field. If you fill a row, column, or 3x3 square, the crop is harvested. Harvest multiple times at once, and your crops will be a better quality. The total value of each harvested crop is your score for the day. Is it your new high score? Can you get a higher score tomorrow? Farm your way through the year and as you do, you'll unlock new crops, each with their own unique shape and values. Which four crops do you want to use today? The trickier the crop, the more money you'll earn. Do you want to challenge yourself for a high score? Or do you want to just relax and earn some steady cash. It's your square farm, it's up to you! Expand and upgrade your farm by using your earnings to build a barn, stable, or a bunch of other useful buildings. Buy tools such as a watering can, fertilizer, or a sprinkler to help you reach the highest score you can. Animals! Animals can be used to farm animal products instead of crops. They are a little fussier but they earn good money. Watch the season change as the year progresses. Each season has unique bonus challenges. Plant tomatoes in Summer for extra cash! A zen-like and relaxing experience that is easy to sink hours into.
